titleStmt.title: The Quakers vvhitest divell unvailed, and their sheeps cloathing pulled off, that their woolvish inside may be easily discerned in answer to a letter subscribed Iames Naylor, a professed Quaker / written by Ellis Bradshavv.
titleStmt.author: Bradshaw, Ellis.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
